nodes.text: Corellian cinnamon was a type of cinnamon. Weeks after the Battle of Endor, which occurred in 4 ABY, the members of the New Republic Riot Squadron entered a marketplace on Jiruus that smelt of Corellian cinnamon. The additive shared its name with the planet Corellia.
Corellian cinnamon was first mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, which was written by Alexander Freed.
